page.title: 12 Leisure and the young
page.content: There are various voluntary groups which cater for the young and these include:St.John's Ambulance Brigade,The Red Cross,Scouts,Brownies,Girl Guides and various church youth clubs. During term time there is an youth club at the leisure centre.The Monday club caters for juniors up to 12 years of age.There is a snooker table,table tennis,television and a tuck shop.On a Tuesday some of the local breakdancers give instruction.On most Thursdays there is a disco for all up to 18 years of age.To become a member there is a subscription of 2 pounds.Although it seems a lot,membership entitles one to cheaper admission to the Saturday disco. Trips to Bristol ice rink,Newport roller rink and swimming pool are popular.The youth club certainly gives enjoyment to all those who attend.
